programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025)
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025)
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline (2025)
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Danielle Walker
programme.desc: Comedian and actress Danielle Walker drops by - can Alice change her mind about an underused nightshade she finds "slimy"? Plus, Alice whips up a sweet chocolate treat with a molten centre.

programme.title: Four Corners (2025)
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025)
programme.desc: Australias leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the weeks journalism.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: Craig kicks things off in Orbost, in a remarkable brewery run by a young couple who make revolutionary beer by linking up with local farmers and foragers, under the wise guidance of Indigenous writer and teacher Bruce Pascoe.

programme.title: Framed S1
programme.desc: A Picasso has been stolen from the National Gallery of Victoria and the thieves are making sure everybody knows about it. Who is behind these bizarre ransom notes and what have they done with the Weeping Woman?

programme.title: Art Works S2
programme.desc: We revisit some great stories from the regions. Meet artist Christopher Zanko, photographer Sammy Hawker and sign-writer Graeme McCullough. Plus, we head to Bundanon Art Museum and Parrtjima festival in the Red Centre.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025)
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe OBrien (2025)
programme.desc: Joe OBrien brings you a comprehensive summary of the days events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on whats going on.

programme.title: Danielle Walker
programme.desc: Comedian and actress Danielle Walker drops by - can Alice change her mind about an underused nightshade she finds "slimy"? Plus, Alice whips up a sweet chocolate treat with a molten centre.

programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Four Against The Bank
programme.desc: Kisah komedi jenayah lucu ini tentang 3 lelaki yang kehilangan simpanan hidup mereka di bank. Dengan bantuan pekerja bank yang telah diberhentikan, mereka cuba melepaskan dendam dengan merompak semula bank

programme.title: Sesat
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: Impiana S4
programme.desc: Kini Impiana lebih berarah kepada golongan Malaynial, dipenuhi dengan segmen yang penuh inspirasi bertujuan untuk dijadikan destinasi rujukan bagi penonton mencari idea untuk hiasan rumah mereka.

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini
programme.desc: Saksikan konsert dari artis artis popular terus ke rumah anda.

programme.title: Casa Liburan
programme.desc: Pengacara akan membawa penonton meneroka rumah-rumah mewah yang unik dan menarik milik hartawan di Malaysia.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan
programme.desc: Tina sedaya upaya menjauhkan Tihani daripada Megat Arif sehingga membuatkan Tihani berasa dia adalah punca keadaan Megat Arif semakin kritikal. Adakah Tihani akan terus meninggalkan Megat Arif ?

programme.title: Stella On Stage

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Whether a trees lifespan is a hundred or a thousand years, eventually it reaches the end of its story and dies. But for trees, the end of one life can mean the beginning of another. In this episode, we discover how trees can extend their lives by walking across the land and planting new roots, how they can learn from trauma, and how a decaying tree has the miraculous ability to nurture new life.

programme.title: Germany and Austria
programme.desc: Joannas emotional exploration begins at the rivers source, Germanys Black Forest mountains, ends at the Romanian/Ukrainian border, and marks two key anniversaries. The first is D-Day - the beginning of the end of World War Two and a brief era of freedom.

programme.title: Nigellas Cook, Eat, Repeat (S1)

programme.title: Jamies 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals (S1)
programme.desc: This time, Jamie shows us a roast dinner cooked all together in one pot, cutting down on washing up but never on flavour; and his store-cupboard version of a speedy carbonara that can use up whatever veg you have to hand. He shares two ways to use pre-packed ingredients to make crowd-pleasing starters or sides, and two stars of Middle Eastern cuisine show how store-cupboard spices can transform everyday ingredients into truly mouth-watering meals.

programme.title: Invisible Hideaways
programme.desc: In Uruguay we venture deep within the rural countryside to an area of remote forests and lakes to a one hundred hectare resort of mirrored cabins. In Sweden we visit the Kolarbyn Eco Lodge - a rustic retreat of 12 hobbit like huts that are replicas of those built in this forest by people making charcoal from as far back as the 1800s.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S31)
programme.desc: Among the guests on Grahams sofa are: "Succession" star Sarah Snook, returning to the West End for her one-woman play "The Picture of Dorian Gray"; pop legend Boy George, talking about his autobiography "Karma"; "The Morning Show" actor Greta Lee, starring in romantic drama "Past Lives"; and the irrepressible Miriam Margolyes, whose book "Oh Miriam!" tells stories from her extraordinary life.

programme.desc: Nisha is making a meatball curry, an Indian chai tea and a Mayan chilli hot chocolate and tandoori chops with turmeric chips, as well as a great veggie kebab option too.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S8)
programme.desc: Scraps are put to use in Reduce, Reuse, Recycle week to create quilted patchwork jackets. Old coats are given a new lease of life and second-hand duvets become maxi dresses.

programme.title: The Forest Sets the Flavour
programme.desc: Rachel heads into the woods in search of mushrooms. She also meets an ice-cream maker who inspires her to experiment with flavours, as she makes a lemon and dill parfait.

programme.title: Addiscombe, South London
programme.desc: George helps out at the restoration of an Edwardian arts-and-crafts terraced house where the amazing original features need plenty of TLC.

programme.title: Nisha Katonas Home Kitchen (S1)
programme.desc: Nisha is making a meatball curry, an Indian chai tea and a Mayan chilli hot chocolate and tandoori chops with turmeric chips, as well as a great veggie kebab option too.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S8)
programme.desc: Scraps are put to use in Reduce, Reuse, Recycle week to create quilted patchwork jackets. Old coats are given a new lease of life and second-hand duvets become maxi dresses.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook (S1)
programme.desc: Donal shares three more delicious dishes; Zingy Korean beef short ribs, citrusy barbecued lamb and, to finish, a flame grilled sweet treat, Bananas Foster.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico (S1)
programme.desc: Paul attends a quinceaera birthday party in Baja California, tries fresh cactus in Milpa Alta and insects in Oaxaca, and visits one of Mexicos best restaurants on the Yucatn Peninsula.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S8)
programme.desc: The sewers follow the pattern for a toddlers sailor suit, make fancy dress Halloween outfits and create out-of-school garments from old school uniforms.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation (S1)
programme.desc: In Eastbourne, Emma and Nick come to the rescue of Becca, Sam and their four children who are swamped by clutter. Fortunately, interior designer Alex Dauley is on hand with some clever solutions.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico (S1)
programme.desc: Paul attends a quinceaera birthday party in Baja California, tries fresh cactus in Milpa Alta and insects in Oaxaca, and visits one of Mexicos best restaurants on the Yucatn Peninsula.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S31)
programme.desc: Among the guests on Grahams sofa are: "Succession" star Sarah Snook, returning to the West End for her one-woman play "The Picture of Dorian Gray"; pop legend Boy George, talking about his autobiography "Karma"; "The Morning Show" actor Greta Lee, starring in romantic drama "Past Lives"; and the irrepressible Miriam Margolyes, whose book "Oh Miriam!" tells stories from her extraordinary life.

programme.title: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex
programme.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview with Emily Chang about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

programme.title: Super Intelligence
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: Animal Communication
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: Quantum Computing
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanitys future water needs?

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: Next Billion
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: Beyond Earth: Private Ambitions in Space
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of Indias private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: How Korean Pop Culture Is Transforming Design
programme.desc: Amid Seouls pulsating energy, Haslinda Amin reveals an architectural renaissance thats reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: The Nation Where Robots and Humans Get Along
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how its paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Can Global Shipping Go Green?
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Does the Perfect City Exist?
programme.desc: Singapore has transformed itself from a colonial outpost into a thriving metropolis boasting unparalleled infrastructure, seamless transportation and accessible housing.

programme.title: Rebirth of the Worlds Original Tech Giant
programme.desc: Japan is seeing a renaissance in its chip industry. Spearheaded by giants and startups alike, what lessons are there for the world as this digital transformation takes shape?

programme.title: David Blitzers Sports Investment Playbook
programme.desc: The hosts sit with David Blitzer, co-founder of Harris Blitzer Sports and Entertainment, to discuss how his teams use data and analytics to improve the fan experience.

programme.title: Principles With Bill Belichick and Ray Dalio
programme.desc: The hosts sit for a special conversation with two titans, football coach Bill Belichick and Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio, to learn their guiding principles for success.

programme.title: How Youth Sports Became a $38 Billion Play
programme.desc: Major League Baseball Hall of Famer Cal Ripken Jr. and his brother Bill have turned youth sports into big business. But can they chase profits while preserving whats best for kids?

programme.title: NBA President Stokes Africas Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Toronto Raptors President Masai Ujiri leads the only non-US team in the National Basketball Association, and hes spearheading an effort to take the game global.

programme.title: Shahid Khan Wants to Marry the NFL and EPL
programme.desc: Shahid Khan owns two teams, one in the National Football League and the other in the English Premier League. Hes got an ambitious playbook to boost both kinds of football around the world.

programme.title: Womens Soccer Wants to Be More Like the NFL
programme.desc: National Womens Soccer League Commissioner Jessica Berman is presiding over a pivotal moment for womens soccer. Can she help turn astronomical growth into a sustained business?

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Bloomberg Intelligence
programme.desc: Bloombergs Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney harness the power of Bloomberg Intelligence to provide in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries.

programme.title: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trumps administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: The Dirty Business of Monkey Laundering
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Scambaiter Exposes Massive Dubai Crypto Scam
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Inside Indias Fertility Underworld
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: How a Ugandan Clinic Exposed a Private Healthcare Tragedy
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Brazils Biggest Bank Heist
programme.desc: This is the tale of Brazils largest bank robbery. At the heart of this crime is South Americas most dangerous mafia and a daring heist which took place on whats now known as the "Night of Terror".

programme.title: The IM Academy Story
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom. But some former members say it was a global multilevel-marketing maze that left them financially and emotionally devastated.

programme.title: Murder on Rainbow Mountain
programme.desc: Rainbow Mountain offers tourists a picture-perfect view that has flooded social media feeds. But behind this viral beauty spot is the story of a community at war and cries for help ignored.

programme.title: Inside A UK Care Visa Scam
programme.desc: Alleged scammers in the UK are accused of defrauding would-be migrant healthcare workers out of tens of thousands of pounds. Some victims have turned to a vigilante "scammer hunter" for help.

programme.desc: Hoping to follow in his great-aunts footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Dance Mode
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others cant resist taking Bingos turns for her.

programme.title: Daddy Putdown
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Mission: Day Off
programme.desc: Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the Baker and Pete the Postie on their way to the park cafe on their day off.

programme.title: Mandrill and Sand Lizard
programme.desc: Aneeshwar Kunchala and Lizzie Daly meet the mandrill and sand lizard, and reveal their wild connection - they use colour to attract a mate.

programme.title: Captain Captains Classic Clips
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captains top Swashbuckle moments, her classic clips, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: The Train Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Dancing Bug Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Teamwork Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Everglades National Park, Florida
programme.desc: The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitchs picnic.

programme.title: Timgad Ruins, Algeria
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.title: Gordon Gets the Giggles
programme.desc: Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles. He must find a way to control his laughter before it does any damage.

programme.title: Lemon Cafe
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck discover a Lemon Cafe in the park, but it seems to be nearly closing time...

programme.title: Star Renovation
programme.desc: Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah cant find any of her favourite constellations...

programme.title: Dig
programme.desc: Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Farm
programme.desc: Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Honestly, Monty
programme.desc: Monty becomes nervous when he breaks Jeanies project and doesnt know whether to tell her. He soon learns that you should always be honest.

programme.title: Its Time to Explore the Park
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran have a relaxing yoga class with Auntie Dee before using their senses to enjoy a day at the park.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: Judo desperately wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she is not supposed to get herself dirty.

programme.title: The Decider
programme.desc: The Heelers and Luckys family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the 80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: The Camping Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Medicine Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Song of Peace
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal
programme.desc: Hoping to follow in his great-aunts footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Cabbage
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the marvellous Cabbage.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: As Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it aint pretty!

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case...

programme.title: My Name Aint Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong societys differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughters lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Lets Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fiance so as to drive away two women whom he does not like...

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind...

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident...

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own "Eight Diagram Pole Fight" and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until shes threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His masters daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern - an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all...

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the films hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by "Drunken Master

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot...

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles...

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the groups drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummers mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Ling Yu Rou
programme.desc: CCTV brings you broadcasts of finely-produced artistic dramas that closely follow the pulse of the times.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husbands love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yips boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victims sister takes revenge by spiking the rapists drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the babys life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three Rob-B-Hood must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Lius investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her fathers underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macaus economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Dont Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The "passion choir pilot program" trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the "passion choir" and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fattys father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfathers ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Lets Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliffs ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Maybe Its Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchants mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bos magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Ministers daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxis concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manilas Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Lets Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the childs magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfathers fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you whats moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and Chinas top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in Chinas domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xins very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing Chinas perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: The World Today

We examine the changes and growth in Chinas domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the countrys people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China._x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the regions top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the worlds most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

However, Bagus, who is a teacher at Siskas school, disapproves of Siska and Gerrys closeness because he believes his daughter is still too young.

programme.title: Ditiup Kamu Bikin Cenat-Cenut
programme.desc: The story revolves around the life of a man named Bastian (Cakrawala Airawan). Accidentally, Bastian and Maesaroh end up hugging each other.

programme.desc: The SCTV Carnival is a variety show broadcast on SCTV that comes to your city. It is enlivened by the cast of SCTV soap operas and local musicians. This time, the SCTV Carnival is coming to Indramayu with special and surprising guest stars.

programme.title: Tukang Foto Cintanya Jeprat Jepret
programme.desc: Rico was caught cheating with his ex, and Mika wanted to cancel her pre-wedding photoshoot with Rico. Yuda, as a photographer and Ricos good friend, was tasked with persuading Mika.

programme.title: MASAK APA CEU
programme.desc: A cooking show that demonstrate and inform recipes and how to cook a dish, especially Indonesian cuisines.

programme.title: DOYAN MAKAN
programme.desc: Doyan Makan, will invite viewers to follow a surfing trip and culinary qualifications for popular foods in an area and will also review information on places, prices and the manufacturing process of the food they taste.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 15
programme.desc: Bang Jack plans to build a special boarding school for the elderly. Bang Jack is assisted by his assistant named Habib. Habib is a handsome young man who becomes the child of one of the students.

programme.title: Singkat Padat Langsung Akad
programme.desc: Sadam works as a police officer, who often conducts raids. One day, Sadam caught Melly, his first love from the past, while conducting a raid. Strangely, Melly was astonished because Sadam still recognized her. Confused, Melly suddenly felt happy to have Sadam back. What happens next?

programme.title: BUMI CENDRAWASIH PAPUA
programme.desc: Ikhsan intends to work in the city, but the city dwellers annoy him with their arrogant behavior. Ikhsan is forced to return to work at his father Mawars cattle farm. Mawar is madly in love with Ikhsan.

programme.title: KARNAVAL INBOX
programme.desc: Gabungan musik dan variety show di berbagai kota di Indonesia

programme.title: BALI TRADISI
programme.desc: A semi documentary that show about the traditions that has been passed down in Bali.

programme.title: GASPOL
programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: Temenan Udah, Pacaran Yang Belum
programme.desc: Olive (Amanda Salmakhira), who works as a jewelry store clerk, likes to approach men who already have girlfriends. However, in reality, the men she approaches no longer like her and even consider her a destroyer of happiness. Ilham (Ridho Ilahi), her friend, does not want Olive to get involved in such situations because it will inevitably involve him as well.

programme.title: Tutorial Ajak Nikah Jalur Express
programme.desc: It tells the story of an older sister who is seriously ill and has to take care of her only child because her husband is irresponsible. The older sister asks her younger sister, Zahra, and her friend, Andika, to get married in front of her while she is sick so that they can take care of her niece.

programme.desc: Bian was shocked when he realized that the girl was Qiara, an old friend of his. However, Qiara could not recognize Bian because she had lost her sight due to an accident. programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: Part 2 (B)

programme.title: Fathers, Fists And Fights
programme.desc: From the perspective of the person being arrested, viewers get a firsthand understanding of what truly happens once the handcuffs are on and the justice system begins its process.

programme.title: Strangers Online
programme.desc: When a 13-year-old girl goes missing and is found murdered, virtual evidence she leaves behind leads to two shocking arrests.

programme.title: Canadian Lake Monster And More
programme.desc: A Russian man is attacked by a knife-wielding ghost. Two fishermen come face to face with a legendary Canadian lake monster. A team of ghost hunters encounter the harrowing ghost of a young girl.

programme.title: Andy (Part A)

programme.title: Parents Gone Bad

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black womens disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Jean Perera: The Beauty Queen Murder
programme.desc: When former Malaysian beauty queen Jean Perera was found brutally stabbed in 1979, the subsequent murder trial would capture and divide public opinion.
A man risks his life to save his wife during a home invasion; two convenience store workers defend their workplace; a hairdresser is put in an unpredictable situation; and more.
A prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate who holds a shank to his neck; a motorcyclist and his girlfriend are attacked in the street; a porch pirate is busted; and more.

programme.title: OMG Caught On Camera
programme.desc: Two friends emerge uninjured after being hit by a car - could this be the work of guardian angels? Nine skydivers miraculously survive after their planes collide over Wisconsin.

programme.title: Kelsey Smith
programme.desc: Kelseys family knew something was amiss when their usually responsible and responsive daughter didnt respond to their texts while out running an errand.

programme.title: Kamryn Johnson
programme.desc: 9-year-old Kamryn Johnson is supposed to be at gymnastics class when her mother, Sheraton, receives a frantic phone call saying Kamryn is being held captive for ransom.

programme.title: Small Towns, Big Crimes
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Peace Love And Murder In Marin
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern Californias peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: Killed For The Cash
programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.title: Bound By Tragedy - Amber Dubois and Chelsea King
programme.desc: In February 2009, 14-year-old Amber Dubois vanishes while walking to school. A year later, detectives are no closer to finding Amber when 17-year-old Chelsea King disappears while jogging.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Murder
programme.desc: In the shadow of the Rockies, Carolyn Jansen, 43, is found dead, stuffed into a duct-taped container. Detectives have two suspects but no clear way to tell who is the killer.

programme.title: Star Power
programme.desc: Follow the host as we explore the lives of Taiwans entertainment stars-beyond the spotlight and behind the scenes.

programme.title: Mayday Mayday
programme.desc: In Oregon, a man vandalises "The Goonies" house before stealing a yacht. In Texas, a shootout with police leaves one officer critically injured.

programme.title: Mold To Bold
programme.desc: Carmine redesigns a kitchen and bathroom while Mike goes all out on the entire yard, and it makes for a tough decision of which plan to prioritize.

programme.title: Nebraska Super Outbreak
programme.desc: In 2024 a tornado outbreak devastates the Central Plains. Trains flip, homes are torn apart, and a deadly night twister hurls debris onto a car.

programme.title: Otter Tail Transformation
programme.desc: A family of five are looking for a forever home in Otter Tail County, Minnesota.

programme.title: The Hidden Tribe The Pig Festival
programme.desc: Adventurer Fritz Meineck ventures into remote regions of the world to complete seemingly impossible challenges, with no outside help and limited equipment.

programme.title: Ultimate Conman
programme.desc: In Arkansas, police chase a stolen U-Haul, leading to a devastating crash and an explosive find. In New Mexico, a fugitive vanishes inside a hospital.

programme.title: Boom Phase
programme.desc: At the mid-season peak, three centuries-old fishing strategies compete. Joe relies on instinct, Tyler turns to science, and Niko relies on tradition.

programme.title: Seaborne Sacrifice
programme.desc: In the landmark 20th season of the series, King Crab reopens for the first time in years, igniting a derby-style race not seen since season one.

programme.title: Americas Mia Heroines
programme.desc: Josh Gates searches Cote dIvoire, West Africa, for a missing American military plane from World War II, and its crew of 18 members.

programme.desc: Josh Gates explores the deadly marshlands of England for the crown jewels of a despised king. Then he investigates the mystical origins of Stonehenge.

programme.title: Water You Waiting For
programme.desc: With water running critically low at their only wash dam, The Cheals work to restore a second agitator. Slim Pickings battle a bung wall breach.

programme.title: Jared Vs Goliaths
programme.desc: Jared Douglas attempts to harvest the planets biggest, most valuable trees. But getting these giants from the forest to market could kill him.

programme.title: Bad Intentions
programme.desc: A woman opens fire in a police station. Cops catch a man snooping on his neighbours. And a woman finds an unexpected guest in her childs bed.

programme.desc: A man flees his axe-wielding roommate. A group of teens hunt for a couple of package thieves and police receive an assist from an unlikely animal.

programme.desc: A Bering Sea gale takes out Ricks deckhand while Sophia helms the Seabrooke in high-risk conditions. Johnathan alters time to make good on a promise.

programme.desc: Battling with Tyler for the lead, Joe partners with Niko. But when Nikos zapper fails at the worst possible moment, Tyler steps in to save the day.

programme.desc: Josh tracks down the legend -- and treasure -- of an outlaw posse who terrorized the Midwests railroads.

programme.desc: Chris and Jessica have decided to embrace the lake lifestyle and purchase a boat. Can they turn a fixer upper into the retreat of their dreams?

programme.title: The Kindig C10
programme.desc: The C10 moves into final assembly but the team struggle to get the bed to fit perfectly. Plus, the upholstery runs into one problem after another.

programme.title: Broken Limbs
programme.desc: To make up for lost profits, Jared takes a huge gamble on bringing two valuable pieces of machinery back to life after decades of neglect.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S6)
programme.desc: Follows the interventions of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Spain who are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S6)
programme.desc: Follows the interventions of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Spain who are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Tethered
programme.desc: Aspiring rapper Michael Munson is found shot in his car with cash and drugs. Detectives suspect a link with another shooting, but can they prove it?

programme.title: Suspect 1
programme.desc: After the brutal binding, torture and murder of a woman in her home, her ex-husband calls 911, but police suspect he is the killer.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: A kidnapping brings FBI agents to Illinois in a race against time to find Larry and Connie Van Oosten. The truth shocks the town as agents try to find the couple alive.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Most Extreme Adventures
programme.desc: Josh Gates and his crew share personal stories while they count down the top ten most extreme adventures theyve endured while filming season two of Expedition Unknown.

programme.title: Grand Theft Viral
programme.desc: When jewel thieves get stuck in a shop, a fleeing carjacker hides in a port-a-potty, and a criminal tries to escape, the law fights back and puts them behind bars.

programme.title: Wild On The Water
programme.desc: The US Coast Guard and Marine Law Enforcement patrol the high seas. Officers capture runaway boats, rescue families, and outsmart drug traffickers.

programme.title: Back From The Dead
programme.desc: Jared moves into an abandoned logging camp, placing a $250,000 bet on a remote, dangerous site that will either sink or save his business.

programme.title: The Rose Tattoo
programme.desc: The body of a South Carolina man turns up floating in the Black River. Investigator Allen Morris, working his first homicide case.

programme.title: Ultimate Conman
programme.desc: In Arkansas, police chase a stolen U-Haul, leading to a devastating crash and an explosive find. In New Mexico, a fugitive vanishes inside a hospital.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S6)
programme.desc: Follows the interventions of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Spain who are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S6)
programme.desc: Follows the interventions of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Spain who are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Suspect On The Line
programme.desc: After a mans savage murder at home, his wife is in the frame after calling 911, but the truth is more horrific than anyone dared believe.

programme.title: Gwyneth Vs Terry: The Ski Crash Trial
programme.desc: When actress Gwyneth Paltrow and retired optometrist Terry Sanderson collided on a Utah ski slope, an injured Sanderson sued Paltrow after accusing her of skiing recklessly.

programme.title: The Flopping of the Bullruses
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - shes taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Uggas excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: A Hair-ifying Night
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Dr. Catastrophe
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, DAngelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day
programme.desc: Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Kitty Cat Cam
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Dollhouse Defenders
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie
programme.desc: When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Lulas Last Stand / Triple Trouble
programme.desc: Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Crash Course
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while theyre with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Furious Fun
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Adventure
programme.desc: Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: Fountains
programme.desc: Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peets Stinky Pits
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure
programme.desc: Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise
programme.desc: Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Kitty Cat Cam
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Dollhouse Defenders
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: P.U.
programme.desc: Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim and Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Hush, Little Baby
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Night of the Frodarg
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tims fears of a local legend and Boss Babys fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the schools mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Straycation Part I
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Straycation Part II
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 2
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year - and hes also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nians cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but theyre no match.

programme.title: Wu You Gonna Call?
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their "creature awareness" message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: The Ditch Sitch
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge.

programme.title: Ride or Die
programme.desc: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: Empty Fireworm Nest
programme.desc: When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: Dr. Catastrophe
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, DAngelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.
