programme.title: Night of the Frodarg
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tims fears of a local legend and Boss Babys fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere
programme.desc: Its parents weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupps eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Thunder Games
programme.desc: When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Shock and Awww
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 2
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year - and hes also taken their other creature friends! programme.title: Downpour
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 2
programme.desc: Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but its not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.

programme.title: The Terrible Twos
programme.desc: When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: House of Flying Pandas
programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Mad About Madagascar
programme.desc: The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Are You There Frank? Its Me, King Julien
programme.desc: Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence - and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: Unsolved Mystereep
programme.desc: When Grans cane and Sandys bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: When Miraderos Christmas presents are delayed and snow isnt falling, Lucky and her friends decide its up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Slide
programme.desc: Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Crystal Venom
programme.desc: The Castle of Lions mysteriously turns against the Paladins, forcing Princess Allura to make a difficult sacrifice to save Team Voltron.

programme.title: Best Frenemies/The Jamaican Jerk Chickens
programme.desc: Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: The Ants And The Grasshoppers/Dont Feed The Troll
programme.desc: The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Mixed-Up Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Game Show
programme.desc: Its Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the "butt xylophone" couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Untitled Templeton Project
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the towns faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Remote Control
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what hes been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Please Hold for the Next Representative
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think theyve solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: It Flies in the Family
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting
programme.desc: When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Mixed-Up Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Pet Project / Mission Improbable
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sams behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into mans best friend material. / When Ellies friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, its up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Marias painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenkos mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda wont give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Grumblegard, Part 1
programme.desc: While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Grumblegard, Part 2
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Sea Monsters / Puff Fruit
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Chef Js Tale
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Bravery
programme.desc: Tired of the Mayors needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero - but being "brave" quickly goes to the Mayors head.

programme.title: Golem
programme.desc: The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the schools mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S
programme.desc: George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door
programme.desc: When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Lucky And The Pie P.I.
programme.desc: Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera
programme.desc: Frederic makes a play to take over the towns babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Plushythingy
programme.desc: When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.desc: George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Sticky Business
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phils perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Guy Time
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: Tales from the Foxs Tails
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Yis LiLi-est Fan
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old whos positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crews pursuits. When Everest doesnt return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLis intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Qilin-mania
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yis building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this "Qilin" isnt an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.desc: Tom and DAngelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: The Next Big Sting
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragons Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

programme.title: In Dragons We Trust
programme.desc: After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Coronation of the Iron Goddess
programme.desc: When things dont quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Norway Out
programme.desc: Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the worlds greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: The Phantom Of Club Moist
programme.desc: King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find its haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: Gran Day Out
programme.desc: When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard
programme.desc: When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.desc: Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Collection and Extraction
programme.desc: Team Voltron infiltrates a hidden Galra Space Station to investigate why Zarkon is attacking planets and siphoning the life energy from the universe

programme.title: Worst In Show/Belle Of The Gumball
programme.desc: Whiplash finds a perfect poodle moth to enter to compete in the show; Chet attends a gala with a rich snail after hes named "Handsomest Snail Alive".

programme.title: Hawaii Five No/Story Of J.J.E.F.F
programme.desc: The crew competes for Burns affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Kitty Pirates
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean its time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCats favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Daddy Daughter Day
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldnt be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eeps traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isnt until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes its time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Please Hold While We Connect You
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Double Finked
programme.desc: Magnuss nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Divewings
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out whats making them so upset.

programme.title: Best Friends Day / The White Whale
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she cant understand why Kelp doesnt love it, too. If they dont agree on this, does that mean theyre not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated its up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallops friend Theo finally comes clean on why hes always rushing off.

programme.title: Boots
programme.desc: Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzos treasure.

programme.title: Sword

programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.desc: After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep shes taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Shack Attack
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot "Qilin" and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season_x000D_1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: We Meat Again
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: A Hair-ifying Night
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.desc: A tricycle that changed the world. 1885, Germany: Carl Benz applies for a patent for a three-wheeler with an engine: the birth of the car. We trace the development, shoot in Stuttgart at the Mercedes-Benz Museum, follow the Bertha Benz route and are on the road in Mannheim, where the Carl Benz had his workshop. Lukas rides in a replica of the first car.

programme.title: Sugar substitutes and sweeteners: How healthy are they really?
programme.desc: Sweeteners are viewed as healthy alternatives to conventional sugar. But studies show they arent free of risk. Also: Iron deficiencies and skin health.

programme.desc: Stay tuned as Deutsche Welle (DW), Germanys international broadcaster presents the countrys news, current affairs and showcases its peoples life and mentality.

programme.title: Building better: Climate-smart homes for improved lives
programme.desc: The construction sector is a huge CO2 emitter. Buildings also shape our lives. They heat up our cities. Rethinking the industry holds the key to many solutions...

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Jermell Charlo
programme.desc: One of the most anticipated fights in boxing takes place at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas as two Undisputed World Champions meet -unified Super Middleweight titleholder, Canelo Alvarez, defending against Junior Middleweight champ Jermell Charlo. Canelo has established himself as one of boxings best fighters, winning World Titles in four different weight classes on his way to becoming boxings biggest star.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Arturo Gatti facing off with Alfonso Gomez in what would be Gattis final boxing match. Also on the card, Andre Berto takes on veteran Carlos Quintana on his way to stardom.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 3
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Biomechanics of Body Preparation
programme.desc: In this episode we follow one of our martial artists as he goes through a grueling tournament and how he uses technology to help him prepare for it.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles Sonny Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew One Gear Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO and IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Womens Weapons Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Womens Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Gerry Penalosa vs. Jhonny Gonzalez
programme.desc: This episode features Jhonny Gonzalez defending his WBO bantamweight title against Gerry Penalosa, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. Freddy Hernandez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Andre Berto defend the WBC welterweight championship against Freddy Hernandez. With one quick, hard right hand to the face in the first round, this bout comes to a sudden halt. Berto looks to keep his undefeated streak alive and thrust himself into talks for bigger fights with the likes of stars such as Floyd Mayweather. Also on the card, Jean Pascal looks for an upset in the light heavyweight division.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Hague Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Hague Grand Prix and we follow some of Netherlands judo heroes as they try to mark the event with a medal tally to be proud of.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Hugo Hernan Garay
programme.desc: With the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Huck (33-1) defends against veteran contender Hugo Garay (34-6) at the Olympia Eissportzentrum in Munich, Germany. Huck, fighting in his adoptive home country, was making the 7th consecutive defense of his championship.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Miami Finals: Part 1
programme.desc: Thirty finalists return to Miami with a chance to land one of 15 spots in Las Vegas. In addition to the qualifying rounds 6 obstacles, athletes must tackle 4 additional challenges--including the all-new Minefield!

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a highly-praised and hard-hitting lightweight championship fight featuring Juan Manuel Marquez and Michael Katsidis that was named HBOs 2010 Fight of the Year. Also on the card, welterweight champion Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC World super welterweight title between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya that made $165 million in total gross revenue, making it the richest fight ever, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles Sonny Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 3 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Nkazimulo Zulu vs. Jake Hadley
programme.desc: This episode features a flyweight championship bout as Jake Hadley takes on the veteran Nkazimulo Zulu. Bonus coverage includes Mutuale Basambombo vs. HP Van Staden and Christian Bobo vs. Adrian Sanchez.

programme.title: WCCB Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: Ffrom Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Womens Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.Only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Kotooshu, Goeido and Kotoshogiku from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.title: Mens Forms Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the CMX Weapons Championship and the Mens Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles Sonny Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.desc: 8 powerful kingdoms and 51 kings. Find out how she succeeded in being the only Southeast Asian country to remain independent throughout her history.

programme.title: Peacekeepers (S1)
programme.desc: The Chinese Peacekeepers in South Sudan are put to the test by problems inside and outside the UN Headquarters in Juba.

programme.title: The Snake Pit
programme.desc: King of the Swamp Troy Landry and Pickle Wheat get a hot tip about a place called the Snake Pit from a local. Bill and Tes investigate a rock quarry full of pythons.

programme.title: Gators From The Grave
programme.desc: Troy attempts to run a record-breaking 100 lines alone. Ashley and Anna venture into a notoriously haunted swamp known as the Cemetery, while Black Rambo searches for a legendary vampire killing kit.

programme.title: Lion Alley
programme.desc: Jakes snowmobile breaks down in the heart of Lion Alley. Paul takes on a neighbours beaver and muskrat problem. Kidd and Harry plow a backcountry airstrip so planes can land safely.

programme.title: Wonders Of The Ancient World
programme.desc: Remarkable feats of engineering from our ancient past span the globe. Some are amazing in size. Others in sophistication. Some are so strange they border on inexplicable.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle And The Beyond
programme.desc: All over the world are forbidden triangles - mysterious regions where ships, planes, and people enter and then just disappear. They are found in Bermuda, Alaska, Japan and elsewhere. But why?

programme.title: Butterfly Knife In Your Stomach?
programme.desc: The Batangas region of the Philippines is famous for its butterfly-knife makers and wielders. Jaime learns a few tricks as she passes through but when she comes under unexpected attack, will they work?

programme.title: Porcine Procreation
programme.desc: Jaimes chance encounter with a boar owner gets her front-row tickets to watch pigs mating on a farm.

programme.title: Gladiators Of The Forge: Viking vs Gladiator
programme.desc: Its back to the Forged in Fire Colosseum for two more intense one-on-one battles. The defending champion has taken down two opponents, including a two-time Gladiator of the Forge.

programme.desc: In the fourth episode of a five-part event, its back to the Forged in Fire Gladiator Arena for two more sudden death battles. Our defending champion currently has four wins under his belt.

programme.desc: The Arctics frozen landscape continues to push the remaining survivalists to the brink. One participant finds themselves at risk for frostbite, while another is convinced the end days are near.

programme.title: Piles To Go Before I Keep
programme.desc: Laura takes the reigns alone in Fullerton, and proceeds to outsell Dan. Brandi gets assaulted by her locker but ultimately drives home a winner. Rene postpones a day date in favour of a work date.

programme.title: Lego My Locker
programme.desc: The units are packed full in Stanton, as Darrell has to deal with Kimbers eyes on a competitor. Ivy brings a full truck, hoping for a second haul. Dusty unpacks what could be the ultimate assistant.

programme.title: Chinas Extreme Skywalker
programme.desc: Dubbed the Prince of Tightrope Walking and holder of six world records, an ethnic Uighur man pushes the limits and performs without safety equipments.

programme.title: Taiwan Amphibious Recon Unit
programme.desc: We follow new recruits in the 139th batch of frogmen as they enter the final and hardest part of training: hell week, 6 days of non-stop continuous brutal exercises where only the toughest will survive.

programme.title: Amulets Of The Chosen
programme.desc: The Philippines is home to mystical amulets used to lead revolutions, endure wars and rise up against colonial invaders. Passed down from ancient ancestors, how could they have acquired such powers?

programme.title: Shapeshifters Of Java
programme.desc: Why do so many cultures across the world tell stories of people who can transform into animals? Could they have their roots in lost human abilities? Keys to unravelling this mystery could lie in Indonesia.

programme.title: Curse Of The Carrier
programme.desc: The team dives in search of an A3 Skywarrior attack aircraft that was lost in a suspicious disaster off the USS Saratoga aircraft carrier in 1960. The Saratoga lost eight men on this single mission.

programme.title: Grave Danger (Part 2)
programme.desc: The CSI teams come together to save one of their own when they learn one team member has been kidnapped and buried alive, and now they must find him before he suffocates under 5 feet of dirt.

programme.title: Hail to the Chief
programme.desc: When ALF continually disrupts Kates sleep to ask about the American political process, Kate gives ALF a civics lesson and then dreams that they are opponents in the Presidential election.

programme.title: Inn at the End of The Road
programme.desc: Hawke and Santini must find a newly developed electronic device which was stolen by a group international thieves. With Airwolf they begin a perilous search to locate it before irreparable damage is done.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: The series depicts the stories of Pompeiis citizens with the threat of Mount Vesuvius bringing chaos and destruction. Arbacess machinations and the persecution of Christians add to the growing tension.

programme.title: Dial M for Martin
programme.desc: Niles isnt too thrilled at the prospect of his father moving in - until he realizes that Daphne is part of the package.

programme.title: A Short Story
programme.desc: George is chosen "Small-Business Man of the Year."

programme.title: Death Squad
programme.desc: Jim Phelps leads the IMF to aid one of its own members when Barney is arrested and marked for execution by a sadistic police chief.

programme.title: Babes
programme.desc: When a boy is lit on fire, the SVU investigates the malicious crime. Their investigation leads to one man to admit to hurting the victim and opens a new door for the detectives when he unveils a group of pregnant teenage girls.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: When the Ochmoneks nephew Jake, a belligerent boy who has trouble communicating with anyone, comes to stay with them, they ask the Tanners for help in raising him. ALF discovers Jakes hidden talent.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Widely regarded as the two best managers in Premier League history, Sir Alex Ferguson and Arsene Wenger went toe to toe on the touchline on numerous occasions over the years. But what made their rivalry so fierce? We take a look at the intense clashes, memorable moments on and off the pitch and the monumental impact their duels had on English footballs modern era.

programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 5, with Manchester United clashing with Chelsea at Old Trafford, Fulham hosting Brentford, and Arsenal facing down Manchester City in North London.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Iliman Ndiaye will forever go down in history as the man who scored the last ever goal at Evertons famous old ground Goodison Park, only to follow it this season with the first strike at their impressive new home, Hill Dickinson Stadium. This week, Evertons talismanic forward shares his fascinating story. Having grown up in Senegal and France, the young man struggled to make his mark in the game before moving to England with his father.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Nicknamed The Entertainers, Kevin Keegans Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Six Premier League Titles, Four League Cups, Two FA Cups, a Champions League medal and 96 caps for England. Few players can boast a footballing CV like Kyle Walker. After eight years at Manchester City and a year in Italy with AC Milan, Walker is back in the Premier League with newly promoted Burnley. This week, Walker sits down with The Big Interview to reflect on his time at the Eithad ahead of returning as a visitor.

programme.title: Endurance Swimrun - One Water Race
programme.desc: The One Water Race is a professional race and created for the absolute best endurance racers in the world. The race distance is about 250 km, a distance of 6 marathons, split up into approximately 200 km running and 50 km swimming. Running takes place on all types of terrain, rocks, cliffs, gravel roads, paths but mostly unpaved and difficult terrain. Swimming is in open sea and can often feature strong winds, currents and waves.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2
programme.desc: Kendras meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, thats where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Kens presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Boleh Tukar Nasib Tapi Jangan Tukar Cinta
programme.desc: Dara, accompanied by Zaky, goes to Jakarta to find the boss of the company that burned her land. By chance, Dara has an accident and meets Aurel, who looks just like her. It turns out that Aurel is the daughter of the boss Dara is looking for. Dara takes this opportunity to switch places with Aurel.

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahayas favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Cinta Si Boss Galak Double Kill
programme.desc: Fitri was surprised when Reynard took her to work as a domestic helper in his house. Fitri, who had no skills as a domestic helper, slowly accepted the job in order to have a job and a place to live. However, Fitri was always patient with her fierce boss.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta

programme.title: Mendadak Tenar Sungguh di Luar Nalar
programme.desc: It all started with Nina, the seblak seller. The owner of the seblak stall looked so much like Tasya that they could have been twins. Eventually, Bryan, Tasyas manager, met Tasya by chance.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the babys grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Bidan Desa Penuh Cinta
programme.desc: Rara is a midwife in a village. In an incident, Rara meets Gigih, a vegetable seller. When Rara has a patient who wants to give birth, Rara stops Gigih, who is on his way to the market. Gigih is very upset with Rara because they have met twice in incidents that have annoyed him. One day, Gigihs parents fall ill and need to be examined immediately. Despite still being angry with Rara, Gigih reluctantly asks her to check on his mothers condition.

programme.desc: Its the day of the Team Truck Challenge, a race where all the trucks get to compete in teams of two! But when Crusher chooses a new partner instead of Pickle, his disappointed sidekick teams up with Blaze to prove his mettle.

programme.title: The Jungle Horn
programme.desc: Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Kitties
programme.desc: Humdinger puts on cat costume, the Alien Kid mistakes him for a real kitty in need of a home.

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi and Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar
programme.desc: Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // Its Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porters tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: Pups Save A Royal Painting
programme.desc: Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus / The Crew Builds A Lifeguard Tower
programme.desc: When Speed Meister steals Rubble and Crews bus, the pups have to stop it in time for Sierra Sparkles big concert! // Its the perfect beach day in Builder Cove! If Rubble and Crew can build a lifeguard tower so the beach can open...

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Bridge
programme.desc: Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. Its up to Rubble and Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Partly Claudia / Ranitas Magic Stripes
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide. / Boots gets a case of Tickle Tail that Ranita the Frog can cure if she gets her magic stripes by helping friends around the Rainforest.

programme.title: Goldies Understudies / One Little Peek
programme.desc: When Goldie overbooks herself, she trains her friends to be her understudies for the day. // Its Baby Sharks birthday and itll take all the patience he can muster to not peek at his gift.

programme.title: The Time Capsule / Petstravaganza
programme.desc: After finding Grandpas old time capsule, Baby and William go overboard making their own. // Vola throws a pet adoption party for the quirky critters at the pet fair.

programme.title: Musical Instruments
programme.desc: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.title: Dressing Up
programme.desc: Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: New Shoes
programme.desc: Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: The School Fete
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while theyre there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Mummy Pigs Birthday
programme.desc: It is Mummy Pigs birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: The Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: The New Car
programme.desc: The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool
programme.desc: Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barba TV / The Museum
programme.desc: The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Rooftop Stage / The Crew Fixes The Lighthouse
programme.desc: When Grocer Gabriel and Sierra Sparkle both need construction help before Banana Day, Rubble and Crew has their paws full. // Speed Meister shines his face in the sky with the lighthouse! But when a ship needs that light, the pups jump into action.

programme.title: The Crew And Rocky Build A Bear Island
programme.desc: Rocky visits Rubble and Crew from Adventure Bay just in time to see Builder Coves new baby bear! But when Park Ranger Rose asks for construction help, Speed Meister accidentally ruins the bears home. Its up to all the pups and Rocky to save the day!

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Kitties
programme.desc: Humdinger puts on cat costume, the Alien Kid mistakes him for a real kitty in need of a home.

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi and Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Mountain Surfers / Pups Save Humdingers Home Away From Home
programme.desc: Zuma and Hurricane Harrigan are about to go kitesurfing when a mighty wind sweeps them off the beach. // Mayor Humdinger takes his trailer and his kitties out for a sunny, desert vacation.

programme.title: The Barbapapa Family / The House of Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that Francois parents built for him. // The house of Barbapapa is far too small now that Barbamama and the Barbabebe have arrived in his life.

programme.title: Bbarbalalalalalala / The Biodisaster
programme.desc: Barbalala and the family life! / Barbabright and Barbabeau have designed a huge wooden toy powered by an engine using bio oil.

programme.title: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case
programme.desc: Theres a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble and Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motors talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the bands instruments break, Rubble and Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: Paramedic Power
programme.desc: When Blazes friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Double Dare You / Roy
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot thats also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up
programme.desc: Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoos belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim
programme.desc: The fate of the citys squidapple supply lies in Babys fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find theyre in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Goldies Greatest Role
programme.desc: Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Kitties
programme.desc: Humdinger puts on cat costume, the Alien Kid mistakes him for a real kitty in need of a home.

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi and Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Turbots
programme.desc: When Capn Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help but gets caught on a cliff!

programme.title: The Crew and Marshall Build A Fire Station
programme.desc: Rubble and Crew build Builder Coves first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrols Marshall! But when Speed Meisters sneaky sabotage traps Marshalls Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: The Alebrije Adventure / Lets Get A Paleta
programme.desc: Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so its up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Vals paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: Its Only a Mystery... / The Battle
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Living Together / Holey The Snowman
programme.desc: For the very first time, the Barbababies will take the train and sleep in a hotel. // Barbouille crafted a magnificent snowman that the children named Bobo.

programme.title: Truckball Team-Up
programme.desc: Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: CAKE-tastrophe!
programme.desc: When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker trucks baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! Its up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.

programme.title: Pups Save the Sea Sponges
programme.desc: After a tiring deep-sea dive, Zuma dozes off and dreams.

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Kitties
programme.desc: Humdinger puts on cat costume, the Alien Kid mistakes him for a real kitty in need of a home.

programme.title: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger
programme.desc: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdingers attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor wont take a bath before their family photo, its up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // Theres a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Troll Jelly / Catch That Kitty
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help the Grumples make troll jelly before the Grumpy Old Trolls snack time. / Dora and Boots have to recover El Gatito Magico and put it in its special place so all the friends stop acting like a cat.

programme.title: Best Finemies / Dinner with Bentley
programme.desc: When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it. // The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: Swim Break / The Lost Remote
programme.desc: The Sharks travel to a tropical resort where Baby makes a plan to have the perfect vacation. // Grandpa loses the TV remote and searches high and low to find it.

programme.title: Windy Castle
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: My Cousin Chloe
programme.desc: Peppa and Georges cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Pancakes
programme.desc: Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Babysitting
programme.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Ballet Lesson
programme.desc: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Thunderstorm
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Cleaning the Car
programme.desc: Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Lunch
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pigs house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesnt like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Barbazoo Cant Say No / The Doppelganger
programme.desc: Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo...
programme.desc: Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo cant stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Bridge
programme.desc: Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. Its up to Rubble and Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus / The Crew Builds A Lifeguard Tower
programme.desc: When Speed Meister steals Rubble and Crews bus, the pups have to stop it in time for Sierra Sparkles big concert! // Its the perfect beach day in Builder Cove! If Rubble and Crew can build a lifeguard tower so the beach can open...

programme.title: Pups Save the Sea Sponges
programme.desc: After a tiring deep-sea dive, Zuma dozes off and dreams.

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Kitties
programme.desc: Humdinger puts on cat costume, the Alien Kid mistakes him for a real kitty in need of a home.

programme.title: Pups Save the Baddies / Pups Save the Yumi Bee
programme.desc: Humdinger, Sid, and Sweetie have joined forces to try and take over the Lookout. // Humdinger sabotages Yumis Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

programme.title: One Last For The Road / The Little Critters
programme.desc: The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same... // Barbabelle had a restless night because of all the insects!

programme.title: Barbazoos Diary / The Great Reporter
programme.desc: Barbazoo have plenty of things to write about in his diary! // After reading the biography of Nellie Bly, Barbalib is determined to become a Great Reporter!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm
programme.desc: Rubble and Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoes squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel
programme.desc: When Sierra Sparkles big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble and Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash. // Rubble and Crew decide to go big when Grocer Gabriel wants something special built outside of his grocery store.

programme.title: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday
programme.desc: Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chickens birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: The Snowflake Games
programme.desc: Its a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters
programme.desc: The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Balis kittens. Shes scared something will happen and wont let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade
programme.desc: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Deep Dark Disco
programme.desc: The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party.

programme.title: Pups Save the Sea Sponges
programme.desc: After a tiring deep-sea dive, Zuma dozes off and dreams.

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Kitties
programme.desc: Humdinger puts on cat costume, the Alien Kid mistakes him for a real kitty in need of a home.

programme.title: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea.

programme.title: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse
programme.desc: The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Capn Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Not Very Well
programme.desc: Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: It is snowing, so Peppa and George go outside to play.

programme.title: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World
programme.desc: Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Potato City
programme.desc: Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: The New House
programme.desc: Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.desc: The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Capn Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift
programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, its impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School
programme.desc: Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. // Tomorrow is the Barbababies first day of school.

programme.title: The Mystery Bandit
programme.desc: When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blazes metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Zeg and the Egg
programme.desc: Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond
programme.desc: When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, its up to the PAW Patrol find out whats happening!

programme.title: Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark
programme.desc: The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof
programme.desc: After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble and Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Halls roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // Its Grandpa Gravels special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: Whale Songs / Tell-Tale Scooter
programme.desc: Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir. // Baby Shark accidentally breaks Williams new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Lannies Lights / Assembly Required
programme.desc: When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine. // The Sharks order a new table and discover they have to built it themselves.

programme.title: Fancy Dress Party
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: The Museum
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queens room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Very Hot Day
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Chloes Puppet Show
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloes house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Daddy Gets Fit
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Tidying Up
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesnt stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: The Playground
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppas friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because hes scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Daddy Puts Up a Picture
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he cant create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Moving Mission / Barbabrights Invention
programme.desc: During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // Theres a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor wont take a bath before their family photo, its up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky / Pups Save the Lost Penguin
programme.desc: Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky. // Chickaletta switches places with a Baby Penguin.

programme.title: Private Club / Green Algae
programme.desc: Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. // Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: The Invasion / Prank Day
programme.desc: Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. // Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Cafe Carls ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubbles fear of the dark derails the pups Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder
programme.desc: Park Ranger Roses favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoes chickens, but when they get loose, its up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Too Many Swipers / Bateos Home Run
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandmas picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: The Flying Contest
programme.desc: AJ is entering in the Axle City Flying Contest. But when Crusher sends him and Blaze away, they must get back in time for AJ to build his super-cool flying invention!

programme.title: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Stricts twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Shadowland / Medievel Tides
programme.desc: Jealous of Baby Sharks popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Finception
programme.desc: When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups Save Ryder

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, its up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: The Tree House
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pigs house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Horsey Twinkle Toes
programme.desc: There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Naughty Tortoise
programme.desc: Dr Hamsters pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?
