programme.desc: Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded and drops his Pup Pad!

programme.title: Pineapple Invasion / Salsa Imbecilicus
programme.desc: When SpongeBob hides the secret formula in his home, its up to Gary to protect it from Plankton. // When a freak accident causes everyone in town to become as stupid as Patrick, Sandy must save the day.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Krusty / The Whole Tooth
programme.desc: When a storm sweeps the Krusty Krab away, its crew and customers will need a crazed Krabs to lead them back home. // Patricks last baby tooth needs to come out, but hes afraid to let it go.

programme.title: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow
programme.desc: When SpongeBob thinks hes allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: Bummer School
programme.desc: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebes fighting ruins the project. After Chloe expresses her anger toward her siblings, they realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now that theyre guardians.

programme.title: Attack of The Clones
programme.desc: When Danger Force leaves for an out-of-town mission, Ray calls on the Danger Force Clones for help. He quickly realizes that even though the clones look just like their superhero counterparts, they are very, very different.

programme.title: A Finata Full Of Death Bugs
programme.desc: When a dangerous pinata ends up at a kids birthday party, Kid Danger and Captain Man must go undercover and step in before its too late.

programme.title: Leonardo Saddles Up
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: Flee Market / Copy Cant
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that shes the only person Carlitos wont copy, shes determined to change it!

programme.title: Taco The Town
programme.desc: Hector starts selling Rosas delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when theyre more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: Biscuit Ballyhoo / Student Driver Survivor
programme.desc: After the Science Scouts begin selling biscuits to fund a trip to Mars, Mr. Krabs joins the ring and turns it into a competition. // When a competitor threatens to shut down Mrs. Puffs boating school, she must rely on SpongeBob to stay in business.

programme.title: Wiener Takes All / Stuck in an Elevator
programme.desc: Tired of doing grunt work at the Krusty Krab, Squidward takes a new job as Manager of Weenie Hut Jrs. // Squidward gets trapped in an elevator with SpongeBob and Patrick on his way to return a nearly overdue library book.

programme.title: Squidness Protection / Dome Alone
programme.desc: Squidwards amazing new life in witness protection is threatened after SpongeBob and Patrick discover his whereabouts. // While stuck in her dome, Sandy suspects Planktons up to no good and recruits Patrick to investigate.

programme.title: Tutor Sauce
programme.desc: After failing his drivers test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: Which Witch is Which? / Get Off My Lawnie
programme.desc: Bunnys mother visits from the old country. // Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show.

programme.title: Orange Carpet All Access: Tim Rex
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: We are about to introduce the cutest and newest family of dinosaurs to our NJR Global Channel! Lets welcome Tim Rex and his family of space dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blunder Party
programme.desc: After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: Alpaca Lies / Rocket Plan
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Bobby have to deal with an old friend of Arturos-Al the Alpaca, but Al has it out for the kids. // Abuelo helps CJ build a rocket, but when things arent going well, Abuelo tells a little fib to preserve CJs feelings.

programme.title: The Price of Admission / One Flu Over the Loud House
programme.desc: After seeing a scary movie (that his parents told him not to), Lincoln cant go to sleep and pulls an all-nighter. // When a common cold ravages through the loud house, Lincoln believes his sisters have turned into Zombies!

programme.title: Study Muffin / Homespun
programme.desc: Lincoln gets a tutor that all his sisters instantly get crushes on, making it impossible for Lincoln to study. // The kids complain about their house, but when a tornado threatens to destroy it, they start to feel differently.

programme.title: Prime Meridian Love / Stanky Danky
programme.desc: Hazel wishes the main character from her favorite graphic novel into the real world. // Hazel befriends a sentient dumpster named Danky after learning about humans harmful effects on the environment.

programme.title: Peace of Pizza / A New Dev-Elopment
programme.desc: When Dev refuses to participate in Kindness Day, Hazel summons an intergalactic species of diplomats to reason with him. // Hazel learns more about her nemesis, Dev, when forced to work with him on a class project.

programme.title: Little Yellow Book / Bumper to Bumper
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBobs diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: FarmerBob
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins farm, much to his dismay.

programme.title: City Slickers / Fool Me Twice
programme.desc: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. // The family has a new plan to dodge Luans April Fools Day pranking: stunt doubles

programme.title: Net Gains / Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship but gets drafted onto a terrible team. // Mom and Dad are sick of waiting in the long bathroom line so they decide to build a secret bathroom.

programme.title: Selfie Improvement / No Place Like Homeschool
programme.desc: When Carol Pingreys photo gets more likes on social media than Loris she tries to one-up her. // Lola is being temporarily homeschooled. Thinking it looks like fun, the other kids try to get in on it.

programme.title: Peace of Pizza / A New Dev-Elopment
programme.desc: When Dev refuses to participate in Kindness Day, Hazel summons an intergalactic species of diplomats to reason with him. // Hazel learns more about her nemesis, Dev, when forced to work with him on a class project.

programme.title: Alien Zoo
programme.desc: When Danger Force becomes the newest exhibit at an Alien Zoo, Miles must find a way to break them out before they become alien dinner.

programme.title: Lets Go to the Movies!
programme.desc: ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, but when her mind goes blank under the pressure, the rest of Danger Force pitch in and share their own epic--and epically bad--movie ideas.

programme.title: Cruel Summer
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe are working well as a team, until he is accused of committing crimes and Phoebe must apprehend him. Now on the lam, Max learns that the Masterminds henchman is secretly controlling his actions via a chip in his neck.

programme.title: Scream Machine
programme.desc: When Charlottes invention for The Gizmo Show is accidentally destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention she gets could expose Kid Danger and Captain Mans secret identity.

programme.title: Night Of The Mechazoids
programme.desc: The Turtles take the fight to Bishop but shes ready for them... get ready for MECHA-BIHSOP! But when the Mechazoids go out of control, can the Turtles save humanity?

programme.title: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian
programme.desc: The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: Eek, An Urchin! / Squids Defense
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: Dopey Dick / Plankton and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. // Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants (well, more giant than usual).

programme.title: Friendiversary / Mandatory Music
programme.desc: SpongeBob celebrates the anniversary of his friendship with Squidward. Squidward does not. // Squidwards lack of talent lands him in a court ordered music class.

programme.title: Candy Crushed / Master of Delusion
programme.desc: Lola struggles to dampen her sweet tooth when mom challenges her to go an entire week without sugar. // Lincoln strives to impress the Amazing Brailster when hes chosen to be his assistant at the Illusion Chateau.

programme.title: Hurl, Interrupted / Diamonds are for Never
programme.desc: Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret. // After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

programme.title: 28 Puddings Later / Trial and Hair-ror

programme.title: Chapas Phone Home
programme.desc: When Chapas beloved long lost cell phone returns to the Mans Nest under mysterious circumstances, her hunt for the truth threatens to destroy Danger Force.

programme.title: Tide and Prejudice
programme.desc: The Thundermans are visited by High Tide, the former protector of Secret Shores. But when they explain to him that they are the new superheroes in town, he decides to take back his old role, even if it puts Jinx and Booch in danger.

programme.title: Jaspers Real Girlfriend
programme.desc: Jaspers summer camp girlfriend comes to town staying with Charlotte. She quickly becomes jealous thinking Charlotte is in love with Jasper. Charlotte begins to question the girls sanity.

programme.title: Mikey Takes Charge
programme.desc: Mikey and Genghis Frog are sent into the storm on a supply run to the local market when they encounter the electrifying LEE THE EEL! Now Mikey has to step up and be a LEADER!

programme.title: X Marks the Pot / Patricks Alley
programme.desc: A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SquidBird / Allergy Attack!
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. // After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes hes developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: Swimming Fools / The Goobfather
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Grub Snub / Shes All Bat
programme.desc: When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Guss, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lolas newfound attention after she joins the Morticians Club.

programme.title: Much Ado About Noshing / Broadcast Blues
programme.desc: The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynns Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandlers demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia / Fearless
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur, Cosmo and Wanda bring a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period to present day. // Hazel wishes Jasmine was fearless, but the wish goes awry when Jasmines fears escape and invade the school!

programme.title: Operation Dad
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: Orange Carpet All Access: Tim Rex
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: We are about to introduce the cutest and newest family of dinosaurs to our NJR Global Channel! Lets welcome Tim Rex and his family of space dinosaurs!

programme.title: Flee Market / Copy Cant
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that shes the only person Carlitos wont copy, shes determined to change it!

programme.title: Company Picnic / Pull Up a Barrel
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs throws a company picnic to boost morale, but Plankton is hosting his own on the same day! // Mr. Krabs regales SpongeBob with tales from his old Navy days.

programme.title: Car Trek
programme.desc: Charlottes birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency.

programme.title: Numbers
programme.desc: Seung Jo and his team succeed in stopping Je Gyun from taking over Jisan Bank. Ji Soo turns herself in to exposes HK Pte Equitys illegal dealings.

programme.desc: So Eun reads Kang Hos note to her confessing his real identity. With Soo Hos petition and Kang Hos testimony, the judge rules So Eun not guilty.

programme.desc: Hyeong Chun instructs Ki Soo to destroy all the judges documents and computer data. Sam Soo finds out the grievance of technical school students.

programme.desc: Jae In discloses Bi Ryungs involvements in the embezzlement of company funds. Bi Ryung admits to Cha Don she has killed Jang Shik to save Se Kwang.

programme.title: Phoenix Morning Express (24/9/25 Pt2)
programme.desc: The bright and early morning news programme. Reports cover financial news, daily headlines from China, Hong Kong and Taiwan newspapers, as well as world weather forecasts.

programme.title: From Phoenix To The World (23/9/25)
programme.desc: From Phoenix to the World is a news programme where reporters from around the world interact directly with the anchors through satellite and telephone lines to put viewers in touch with important events right from where they happen.

programme.title: Phoenix Panorama
programme.desc: Phoenix Panorama is a series of captivating and controversial documentaries, which includes segments on current affairs, historical anniversaries and exclusive insider views on present developments.

programme.title: News On The Hour (24/9/25)
programme.desc: News On The Hour provides coverage of news and current affairs from around the world - concise, speedy and accurate - keeping viewers informed of the latest breaking news each hour.

programme.title: Zoom In
programme.desc: This in-depth news report focuses on major current political topics, major social events and news hotspots, presenting authoritative views and analysis.

programme.title: Summary Of Press (24/9/25)
programme.desc: Providing a concise review of whats in the press, the show highlights the important news by presenting newspaper headlines and editorial from respected publications.

programme.title: Phoenix Midday Express (24/9/25)
programme.desc: Presenting the most updated international and financial news breaking before lunch, viewers can tune in to stay informed about events happening around the world.

programme.title: Chief EditorS Time (23/9/25)
programme.desc: A summary of the days key events, Chief Editors Time offers a profound look into their implications. Hosted by Phoenixs commentator or chief editor, the programme talks you through major points in the headlines and forecasts future trends.

programme.title: China Insight
programme.desc: Each episode of China Insight features a foreigner who travels around China to observe the current situation of Chinese society, and the life of Chinese people from his perspective.

programme.title: Fact Check On News
programme.desc: This programme looks at rumours or untruthful reports in the media or Internet, bringing out the facts to address the issues.

programme.desc: The musical guessing game continues as Joel Dommett welcomes five of the incognito celebrity singers back to the stage. Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Maya Jama, Mo Gilligan and guest panellist Suranne Jones try to work out who they are.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: Olympian Tom Daley joins Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Maya Jama and Mo Gilligan on the panel for a special superhero-themed edition of the singing show. Joel Dommett invites 5 secret celebrity singers to perform with one being unmasked.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her fathers male chauvinism, intent on proving herself and pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a nave young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted and burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmadas mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father and his estranged family entwines with Kathirs task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing hell come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family and meets lifes hardships as a single mother with resilience and love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace and heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds and win over her husbands large family.

programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gauthams controlling aunt Bairavi and her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.desc: Maha, her familys financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the familys peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Episode 11 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Kualinari symbolizes the symbiotic relationship between a cookware and the cooking techniques that go together in preparing dishes that tantalize the taste buds. Kualinari reflects the reality of learning cooking via online. Watch as couples learn how to cook by just watching a cooking demonstration clip by a guest chef.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 34 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Rais finds out the truth about Matin. Mazi tries to help Matin financially to run away from the authorities. Faza brings Diana to meet his father and stepmother.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 37 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Firman pleads with Iris for her to visit the hospital after Fatimah finds her unconscious at home. He suspects that something is amiss.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 4
programme.desc: Adi, 28, has been wheelchair-bound since an accident which happened when he was 10. As a young kid, he remembers vaguely about the accident but could not recall the exact details as he had amnesia for about 4 months after the accident. His dad, Khairi had left the family for another woman two months before. Khairis parents and siblings who were against him marrying Salina, a former waitress, had reasons to celebrate. Instead of providing family support to Salina, they distanced themselves away.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 10 - Falling (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Wiwik tries to save Kepindo from falling into Susis hands. She tries to coax Neng to attend Kepindo meetings. Tipez prefers to shift her attention to her new found friend. Mel is watching Neng like a hawk and Neng makes more slip-ups. Neng is worried.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 7 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Tells the story about a girl named Alesha who does not get the love of a mother. After a few years, Alesha was taken to Jakarta with her grandmother, Masitoh.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Norfasarie and Huda Ali are both mothers whose online presence is sometimes peppered with the countenance of their young children, whether to share proud mummy moments or as advertising gimmicks. In this seasons opener, host Fiza O probes on how much these mummies are willing to share about their children online while sieving out the bad from the good that comes with sharenting.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Khadijah begins volunteering at the welfare home, despite her initial reluctance. Lina is scheming behind Yahyas back. Meanwhile, tensions rise between Musa and Zaki over how the home should be run, especially when Musa begins embracing more progressive ideas.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 18
programme.desc: Eliza, now also known as Raihana also Raizals wife, returns to Malaysia to take over part of the business. Yem gets fired from his job. Shanie starts going on blind dates.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 - Weight Issues (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Sihat Oh Sihat S2In the first episode, the doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT medical hub, Haizad Imran and Suzairhe Sumari get together with a panel of celebrity and experts to discuss about weight issues. What is regarded as a healthy weight? What is BMI and how do we calculate it? Can obesity be cured? And what do they actually mean by a healthy diet?

programme.title: (PG) Episode 35 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Rais appoints Saiful to take over Matin as GM of his company. Mazi filled with anger, instructs Matin to hurt Icha by causing harm to Sofea.

programme.title: Episode 177
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Episode 14 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Gold a precious metal that is deeply embedded in Malay culture and social tradition. Also seen as an asset for investors. But is gold really recession-proof? DETIK explains. _x000D_

programme.title: (PG) Episode 6: Sembawang (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Tucked away in Singapores northern coast, Sembawang was home to Kampong Wak Hassan, a seaside haven where children caught crabs after school and neighbours gathered in true gotong-royong spirit. This episode traces the shoreline memories.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 4 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Aishah feels the tension from the growing distance between herself and her mother-in-law, Ainon. Lina subtly manipulates Yahya into giving her more financial control. Zaki is upset by the changes in the welfare home.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 15 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Kamariahs grip over Katrina slips as she fails to control her or squeeze money out of her. Meanwhile, Atalia and Dilla lure Haila to Atalia house, determined to put her in her place.

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Cinema, satire and rock
programme.desc: A cinematographic, satirical and musical journey, at the crossroads of cultures, arts and social commitment. The itinerary begins in Brussels, on the occasion of the Cinemamed Festival, celebrating productions from the South.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: A noise in my chimney
programme.desc: Louis comes to help a client and remove whatever it is thats living inside his chimney.

programme.title: Street of the Apparitions in Beauraing
programme.desc: Welcome to Beauraing, where the most extraordinary miracles flood the lives of the most ordinary people! Rue de lAubepine, where they say the Virgin Mary appeared no less than thirty times between 1932 and 1933. Tourists and pilgrims pass before the windows, never suspecting the stories hiding within.

programme.title: Les Mots De La Paix
programme.desc: Crises, coups, wars, transnational threats, outside interference, global warming: the stability of Africa and the safety of the civil populations are in danger. Via twenty words, the political scientist Niagale Bagayoko analyses the current security challenges and dynamics.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.desc: Delboscq is shocked when she finds out that five of Isabelles former partners are dead or in a coma. programme.title: Un Soupcon

programme.desc: Eliott, a naive young researcher, heads off to study a mysterious tribe in Amazonia: the Otopis. An opportunity for him to escape his stiflingly possessive mother, Chantal de Bellabre! But worried about her son, she decides to go in search of him, deep in the jungle...

programme.title: La Bouteille
programme.desc: A jogger speeds across fields burnt by the sun. He throws his finished bottle of water into nature. The bottle immediately comes back to him, interrupting his run.

programme.title: Collection Reportages - Le Fantasme De Louest
programme.desc: Mauritania has become a crossroads for migrants heading for the Canary Islands, Spain and even the United States. On TikTok, videos glorify these crossings. Anne-Fleur Lespiaut and Thomas Pham-Hungs report shows the hopes and disappointments of those who risk everything for a dream shaped by virtual promises.

programme.title: Happy birthday

programme.title: The lost cow

programme.desc: Having finally found a project that really interests her, Rita assumes that Gilberte would want to work with her to develop it. Meanwhile Lomer is treading on eggshells to try to soothe Ritas suspicions about Darlene.

programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? programme.title: Les Mains Libres
programme.desc: Barbara is preparing a film written and performed by long-term prisoners. Twice a week, she visits a prison in the Paris suburbs to conduct interviews. Little by little, a special bond develops between her and Michel, one of her actors.

programme.title: Un Week-End

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yats late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kins footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kins footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Lady Flower Fist
programme.desc: Mui Tsui Fa (Kwan Wing Ho) met Fong Tak (Kong Wa), the richest man in Guangzhou, when she visited her father. They had some misunderstandings and were against each other. Then, Fa offended the General and she had to marry Tak to avoid being punished. Fa, in becoming Taks fourth concubine, aroused jealousy and hate in Taks house._x000D__x000D_The Tso Sect leader held a contest to seek a husband for his daugher, Siu Wan (Chan Siu Ha). Fa won the match in a mans disguise.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didnt realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Puis confidence was badly shattered.

programme.desc: Shao Kangs War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhaos rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.desc: Pestle and Mortar dives into the immersive experience of preparing staples in the most authentic means possible, a culinary experience like never before. It is a cooking shows that brings the audience onto roads less travelled. Each week brings the audience to exotic destinations with their own culture, stories, festivals and needless to say, epicurean ensemble. Back to basics-No more gas stoves and buying fish from the markets, pick up your firewood and start the fire!

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Later weeks, Madhan takes Suseela on a dinner date, and he confesses his love to her. She rejects him. Madhan feels defeated and he recollects his past memories with his ex- wife.Madhan is seen leaving for school.On the ride, he notices a girl whose beauty immediately captures his attention. He tries to find out more about her with the help of his friend Kelvin. He discovers that the girl, named Angeline, has recently transferred to his school.

programme.title: Episode 13 (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Travel through your palette with Gama Gama, a brand-new cooking show focused on taking you on a sensory journey around the globe. Watch as our chefs whip up never before seen fusion dishes as cultures collide in a marriage of flavours. Whats more? We bring to you spice hacks that will level-up your home remedy game, all from the comforts of your kitchen. So follow the aromatic trail and lets go on an adventure.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3
programme.desc: Love, Secrets, Betrayal but in all light Sundaram Kudumbathinar is one family that will make you eventually say One for all and All for One!

programme.title: (PG) Episode 4
programme.desc: Love, Secrets, Betrayal but in all light Sundaram Kudumbathinar is one family that will make you eventually say One for all and All for One!

programme.title: (PG) The Ties that Bind Us (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nila decides to go against destiny to give Prabu a second chance, ready to risk everything she has worked for, despite Sreemanthis attempts to dissuade her. As Prabu regains consciousness, he finds comfort in the presence of George Kutty, Mama, and Deepa. Plagued by an overwhelming emptiness, Prabu embarks on his journey to recovery, in preparation for the next chapter in his life with Deepa.

programme.title: (PG) Crossroads of Consequences (Finale) (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: An amazing opportunity arises at Prabus workplace to visit an overseas museum for research. Landing in Switzerland, he tours the museum, feeling an intense, inexplicable connection to it. As he struggles to unravel his emotions, he encounters a woman standing precariously on a bridge. After spending an unforgettable day together with her, Prabu finally uncovers the missing piece that fills the void in his life.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 19 (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: A newspaper unit undergoes upheaval when it transits from print to digital. This change parallels the journey of the staff who find themselves at the crossroads, grappling with the challenges that life throws at them.

programme.title: Tum Se Tum Tak
programme.desc: Anu and Aryavardhan fall in love despite a big age gap. Facing family disapproval and challenges, they fight to show that real love knows no limits or rules.

programme.title: Vasudha
programme.desc: Vasudha, a cheerful maid, joins business leader Chandrikas home. Despite differing beliefs, she seeks Chandrikas approval and struggles to fit into her elite world.

programme.title: Ganga Mai Ki Betiyaan
programme.desc: The story centers around Ganga Mai, a resilient woman who is deserted by her husband for not giving birth to a son. Refusing to bow to societal expectations, she devotes herself to raising her three daughters with unwavering strength, grace, and affection. Each daughter embarks on a unique path, shaped by her own personality andaspirations.
